mapper.select: select count(1) from member_game_info where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and to_days(create_time) = to_days(now())

select g.*, s.store_name, s.lat, s.lon, s.address, r.room_name,g.play_user_ids,r.type from member_game_info g left join member_store_info s ON g.store_id = s.store_id left join member_room_info r ON g.room_id = r.room_id where g.deleted = 0 and to_days(g.start_time) >= to_days(now()) and g.store_id=#{reqVO.storeId}
and g.status=0
and g.status=1 and #{reqVO.currentUserId} in (g.play_user_ids)
and g.status=2 and #{reqVO.currentUserId} in (g.play_user_ids)
and g.status=3 and #{reqVO.currentUserId} in (g.play_user_ids)
and g.status=4 and #{reqVO.currentUserId} in (g.play_user_ids)
order by g.start_time asc
